sources.title: Gow the Headhunter (1931)
sources.description: Gow the Headhunter is a 1931 exploration film directed by Edward A. Salisbury, featuring documentary footage from his expedition in the South Seas, focusing on the lives of cannibals and the practice of headhunting. The film was originally released in the 1920s and later compiled into a feature-length format.
